positive.review: very good tool for satisfactory especially the auto round tool. saved me a lot of time and hassle !
It's good but when I also have satisfactory open it starts bugging

Makes it very easy to get an overview. I haven't found the need for all functions, so I guess with some more effort in learning the system it will be like magic. It's so much easier than working with the in-game encyclopedia

I found this to be a very useful app for easily planning my factory layouts. The crisp visuals and infinite pan-able zoom-able placement space work very well. Steam cloud saves is such a nice QoL feature - and all that for free! Thank you very much to David Price for developing and sharing this app!
So much more functionality to discover. This is currently the greatest tool i have found for planning out my factories and testing different alternate recipes.

Fire for satisfactory factory planning, way easier to use than online tools etc. BE WARNED BE WARNED BE WARNED, shi is not intuitive and you will prob need to look up a tutorial online so you know how to use it lol. Once you know it tho it's actually super intuitive and super easy to use, been using it for my factories for ages.
very good for advanced builds but there are some issues conecting miners to a pre-built layout

Excellent. I used it to plan out my whole world.
I'd love to be able to set the background to a png/jpeg (I'd use the world map)
Other than that, did exactly what I hoped. I'd be happy to pay for a plus version or something.

Have trouble with building large factories and making it work at 100%? Well then this is what you need. Once you learn how to use it (which is not complicated) you'll find yourself more organized, more prepared and ready for expansion in the future. It works for the start of the game and all the way to the end. Highly recommend if you really want to build some awesome stuff in satisfactory.

A very powerful tool for planning resources. Great for quickly testing if alt-recipes are worth the trouble. However, the modeler has a few bugs and is difficult to use. For example, once you build up a complex mock factory, there's no easy way to start a new blank model.

Very helpful to manage production lines, i like to use this more than satisfactory calculator because i can control more in this, like alt recipes overclock speeds no of machines, etc. Would recommend especially because this is free.

Super useful and makes planning complex factories not an absolute headache. Also really nice for keeping track of older factories you've made and not having to go through and figure out what was happening there. Super great, saves time, and it's free. There's pretty much no reason to not use this tool.
Best planner ever for Satisfactory. You can plan from resources available of from target production. It's simple and yet poweful
Very awesome tool for Satisfactory addicts.  Thanks for making it!
This is an awesome tool!  A must have if you are building large complex factories.
Quick assessment of production capacities
If you play Satisfactory and want to keep your sanity, this is a must have
Its a extremely useful tool, nothing else to say
Great tool, very intuitive. Thanks for making this free :)

[h1] 8/10 - Satisfying Nerdiness [/h1]
[b] Useful tool for Satisfactory nerdy needs! [/b]
[hr][/hr][h2] Tooling [/h2]
Simple but effective empty canvas where can select resources and machines to work out how much of each you will need down to the exact numbers for max efficiency!

Generally helpful if want to work out what you will need to do before building and dismantling all your work over and over again... me before I started this tool.
[hr][/hr][h2] Linux Support [/h2]
Worked perfectly fine on CachyOS with native proton package.
OP, carried me through the game. pen and paper beta cucks BTFO
So many of the Satisfactory Calculators out there are convoluted and hard to use.  This is so simple its stupid.  Its even easier if you have any experience with Logic Flow Diagrams.  10/10
This is almost mandatory I cannot imagine playing satisfactory without this. I wish they had a production planner like this in the game.
A great tool for Satisfactory fans to conveniently plan factories and test ideas without any hassle.
This amplifies Satisfactory to whole new levels! I can't recommend this more!
Very good way to plan facotrys in advance,
Must have tool to help with planning, Works great!
Maybe I will finally make it past Phase Two in the actual game.
Very handy tool for mapping out factory flows.
Me big dumb. Modeler good. Factory grow.
It is great to plan your factory.
super easy to use great to plan your entire save
If you play satisfactory this is a MUST
very good just gotta trust it
Handy tool, very helpful :)
Very useful tool!
This time I'm really gonna do it, I swear...
Great soft !
great
very useful
Really helps with really any project in Satisfactory
good
really useful tool
Works great.
amazing
Amazing tool
Amazing tool
So helps me a lot
üëç
ITS GREAT!
SO GOOD
extremely useful. thanks devs
Good Enough.
isgood

It is 100% recommended to help design and calculate the factory efficiency, but it will so much more helpful if it supports ios to run the program on ipad so that people can still design the factory when they‚Äôre away from their pc!!!
suuuuuuuper usefullto plan layouts and refer back to said layout when it gets messy

Do yourself a favor and download this directly after downloading Satisfactory. It makes planning factories so much easier and much less of a headache. This is a must in my book for anything past phase 1 of the game.
Super helpful for managing complex factories. I can focus on building instead of stressing about remembering every detail.

I've found this to be insanely useful and work just as good, or better!, than online tools. My only requests/thoughts on changes that could make it even better is to have:
-something to check off / restrict the alt recipes that we currently have
-something that could help with planning grid size needed for the build
-unless I missed how to use the priority splitter - a way to denote, or auto split, specifically overflow; multiple builds have overflow issues and I want to see how much exactly I need to work with to make the factory continue working without shutdown
-a notes spot, limited characters would be fine but I run into the need to drop a small 1-2 sentence note on some of my plans to denote something along the lines of "upgrade belts", "requires alt recipe X", "extra iron on location to later build X" "needs power from X"

Genuinely the best modeler for Satisfacotry, 100% required for me. The ONLY suggestion I could possibly give is to be able to favorite certain recipes, so you know which alternates you prefer without having to write it down or compare every time; but still, 100% amazing program
Made planning, balancing, and visualizing the production chain of satisfactory significantly easier and more fun.
its good for getting a plan for satisfactory witch has helped me a lot is also pretty easy to use.
Not user friendly, but one heck of a good tool.  If you like Satisfactory, this is a good tool to have.
One of my favorite ways to relax and plan a new addition to the factory, this modeler has a lot of love baked in and I really appreciate it being made available for this great community!
very good tool for satisfactory especially the auto round tool. saved me a lot of time and hassle !
It's good but when I also have satisfactory open it starts bugging

Makes it very easy to get an overview. I haven't found the need for all functions, so I guess with some more effort in learning the system it will be like magic. It's so much easier than working with the in-game encyclopedia

I found this to be a very useful app for easily planning my factory layouts. The crisp visuals and infinite pan-able zoom-able placement space work very well. Steam cloud saves is such a nice QoL feature - and all that for free! Thank you very much to David Price for developing and sharing this app!
So much more functionality to discover. This is currently the greatest tool i have found for planning out my factories and testing different alternate recipes.

Fire for satisfactory factory planning, way easier to use than online tools etc. BE WARNED BE WARNED BE WARNED, shi is not intuitive and you will prob need to look up a tutorial online so you know how to use it lol. Once you know it tho it's actually super intuitive and super easy to use, been using it for my factories for ages.
very good for advanced builds but there are some issues conecting miners to a pre-built layout

Excellent. I used it to plan out my whole world.
I'd love to be able to set the background to a png/jpeg (I'd use the world map)
Other than that, did exactly what I hoped. I'd be happy to pay for a plus version or something.

Have trouble with building large factories and making it work at 100%? Well then this is what you need. Once you learn how to use it (which is not complicated) you'll find yourself more organized, more prepared and ready for expansion in the future. It works for the start of the game and all the way to the end. Highly recommend if you really want to build some awesome stuff in satisfactory.

Developer has produced the kind of Satisfactory factory design and development app I have wanted to see for a long time. Every spreadsheet you have ever made, you can now throw in the bin. This app is legendary, and game changing. 5 Stars.

Gud but fix the memory leaks and just general performance issiues. Maybye add a pause button to the automatic calculations because the specific flaver of autism i have makes me design my factories pretty wierdly in this progamm, so i often have the problem when setting overclocking speeds that i have to wait inbetween setting the speeds because the programm decides it wants to calculate first.
Otherwise maybye add some ccustomization options, my fourth monitor (where i have this program) is pretty small and it would be nice if i could size up symbols & numbers and also the lines and maybye for extra prettys change colors (this could be extra useful for pepole w bad monitors that do some colors worse then others (like me) lol)
Fun, easy to use, nothing fancy, makes calculating large factories simple.
It's wild that this is free.  The modeler is what I was looking for, with the way I approach things.  It's great!

It's a very good tool that allows you to break bigger builds into outposts and track progress, it also supports "Manual Placement" of things which is nice.  It doesn't do the "Automatic Planning of Recipes" in the same way that the website does.  But I tend to use the website to "Get the basics" and then move it into this tool so I can track it's progress.  It would be nice if there was an import tool to allow this, but currently that's just a wild hope of mine :)
Extremely useful tool for planning out factories. The way you can set up outposts are so smart and makes managing ideas very easy!

If you're into factory-building perfection, Satisfactory Modeler is a game-changer. It takes the already addictive Satisfactory experience and cranks up the creativity. The modeling tools are intuitive, powerful, and make designing complex layouts a joy. Whether you're optimizing conveyor spaghetti or crafting architectural masterpieces, this mod makes it all feel smooth and satisfying. Highly recommended for any serious engineer or casual builder looking to elevate their game!
Had a bit of trouble figuring it out at first but the more i messed with it the more i understood it and now i love it, use it to plan every factory. Super helpful

A fantastically useful tool.

Very easy to use, allowing pioneers of any experience-level to improve their efficiency and productivity.

ADA would be proud.

Or not, most likely.

Amazing tool, very well made. Only request would be mod support to add items that aren't in the base game. It looks like you can do this by editing the file directly, but would love a way to do this automatically. Otherwise, tool is great!
Love this tool!  It's very helpful for planning out my factories.  Would love to see a feature to toggle the satisfactory map in the background!
So good, just wish the programmable splitter was an option. 10/10 would recommend for planning.
its great way better and easier to use than alternatives like the satisfactory calculator (also being file-based is nice). New features getting added like blueprints are great
very intuitive! can be lightning fast or can compute absolutely everything for you automatically.

It has a small learning curve, but I encourage playing around with it and figuring out the system. Once you understand it, it will prove to be an excellent tool for planning factory building and production.
Really helpful if you want to actually plan yourself, instead of just defining output and getting the path calculated for you like some online tools

Cool tool, but in my small factory map erverytime I try to store Reinforced Iron Plates it just shows ? and calculates forever.
Update: I deleted the note before and replaced it now it Works
Without a doubt the most helpful way to play Satisfactory. Other planners or using Exel just doesn't even come close.
Absolutely fantastic and powerful tool for modeling advanced factories.
Great tool.  I prefer using it to the web based ones.  A few quirks, but totally worth checking out.
Does what it says on the tin, and does it well.  Very useful for grand endgame vanity projects.  Plus it's free.  What's not to like?

This is an absolutely MUST get if you're designing factories.  I looked it over quickly couple weeks ago and was like....meh.  But today I finally got around to really checking it out and WOW this should be mandatory download with the game lol
Great tool for laying out ones factories, testing everything before you build in game. Better than many of the other online tools IMO.
Calculating advanced part factories is made so much easier with this tool. I can't imagine using anything else at this point.
THIS THING IS SO FUCKING GOOD, It is just so easy to use, or maybe i'm just too dumb for the online calculator and tools, but this is the best that I have found, good fucking work David
i was so lost when planing my fuel power plant production but this modeler has helped me all the way through the start of mid game to now helping me model my Nucular Power Plant

negative.review: This thing SUCKS. You can't even build the most basic of designs without the arithmatic functions failing to calculate the most simple lines. Literally worse than pencil and paper. Don't bother.
Lacking most of the functionality I need. As long as you don't want anything complicated it might work for you though.

No matter what I do I cannot get it to make sense. People saying it's simple and intuitive are either wrong or I'm just stupid. I cannot make sense of why it does some of the things it does. I try to fix the number of factories for each item since you can't actually have a fractional number of in-game factories, and create overflows for the different parts, but then suddenly it decides it needs 5 times more of some unrelated item, my miners have negative numbers on them, and I'm just sitting there wondering what the hell happened.
I just want to know how the numbers work out if I'm building a factory for the space elevator, but at this point I'd be better off with a pen and paper.
This thing SUCKS. You can't even build the most basic of designs without the arithmatic functions failing to calculate the most simple lines. Literally worse than pencil and paper. Don't bother.
Lacking most of the functionality I need. As long as you don't want anything complicated it might work for you though.

Overall very useful utility for factory planning and I use (in an hour mb used) a lot, but any and all good things that can be said about it is slashed by stupidity of recalculation on restart that has taken hours of my time as often when I open the app I find that schemes are in an infinite recalculation despite the fact that it was all calculated on previous day before I exited the app and calculated fast. 
Finding & debugging what takes time in calculation is the biggest PITA
